First ICA submission=First ICA presentation. Very lucky, great reviewers-understood my research. Wish #ICA21 was in person, but watching from my couch is comfy. Check out Com History's "Modernity in the Archives and the (De)Institutionalization of Communication History."

Our group will be using the conference hashtag: #ica_hmc #ica21 Be sure to follow ICA's best practices when it comes to sharing or commenting on research on social media. That policy can be found in the conference platform.

We also will have two social hours. Details were e-mailed to members, but if you are not yet a member of our group, contact this account or @TeachGuz for details. The first social hour is later today! #ICA21 #ica_hmc

Welcome to the first day of #ica21! Check out all of the amazing presentations being offered within our interest group. To find our presentations, go to Div/IG sessions in the conference platform and click on Human-Machine Communication. #ica_hmc https://t.co/Y70JnBNK6H
